paper_abstract: In this paper we analyze the discrete maximum principle (DMP) for a non-stationary diffusion reaction problem solved by means of prismatic finite elements and theta-method. We derive geometric conditions on the shape parameters of prismatic partitions and time-steps which a priori guarantee validity of the DMP. The presented numerical tests illustrate the sharpness of the obtained conditions. (C) 2009 IMACS. Published by Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Discrete maximum principle for parabolic problems solved by prismatic finite elements
